attributes.action: stop selling us up the river like you are doing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why are you hell bent on selling us to the eu when a referendum would have done now we the english people are dead thanks to you and tony blair So in the eyes of the people you are not fit for the job nor your goverment

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
